Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» Alexander is a famous writer who is very ill and has only a few days to live. He prepares his farewell by preparing his childhood home by the sea. He finds a letter from Anna, his long dead wife, and understands how much she loved him. A love that he took for granted. In a heavy rain hits Thessaloniki Alexander a little Albanian boy as he tries to reunite with the boy's grandmother in Albania. On their mystical journey develops a touching friendship between them. Past and present are woven together and the memories are real.
